sections.name: Life Experiences & Development
sections.description: These questions explore your early formative experiences and how they shaped your fundamental sense of safety and understanding.

questions.text: When you think back to your early childhood, what moments stand out the most emotionally?
questions.placeholder: Describe the moments that feel most significant, whether happy, scary, confusing, or comforting...

questions.text: Can you describe a time when you felt very safe or very unsafe as a child?
questions.placeholder: What was happening? Who was there? How did your body feel?

sections.name: Core Personality Assessment
sections.description: Scientific personality assessment to map your fundamental traits and tendencies.

questions.text: How open are you to new experiences, ideas, and unconventional thinking?
How organized, disciplined, and reliable are you?
